item.title: QEMU Parameter for Audio Devices
item.description: Have you ever use Haiku OS? I follow this project closely since Beta1. While I love to listen to music, I did not pay attention to sound in Haiku OS until now when I want to check whether I can use the browser (Web - Epiphany) to listen to Youtube. To this end, I’ve used some parameters in QEMU. This is how I run QEMU so that my Haiku OS (Beta4) recognized my sound device:
